content.raw:
The filter test looks good. However, when I run npm test, I get the following error in the performance test:

```
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
1880 messages received in 4 seconds, 470 messages/sec
    2) No filter
suiteTeardown


  9 passing (11s)
  2 failing

  1) performance Reciving msgs:
     Error: done() called multiple times
      at multiple (/home/hugo/code/gsoc/gazebojs/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:194:31)
      at done (/home/hugo/code/gsoc/gazebojs/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:201:26)
      at /home/hugo/code/gsoc/gazebojs/node_modules/mocha/lib/runnable.js:226:9
      at Timeout._onTimeout (/home/hugo/code/gsoc/gazebojs/test/test_performance.js:71:17)
      at tryOnTimeout (timers.js:224:11)
      at Timer.listOnTimeout (timers.js:198:5)


```

Surprisingly, the performance test works fine in the default branch. 
Are you seeing the same issues?
